mapper.insert: insert into board (title, writer, content) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.select:
select * from board where isDel='N'
order by bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{qty}
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, read_count = read_count -2 where bno = #{bno}
update board set isDel = 'Y' where bno = #{bno}
update board set read_count = read_count + 1 where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from board where isDel = 'N'
mapper.update: update board b set b.cmt_qty = (select count(content) from comment c where c.bno = b.bno)
update board b set b.has_file = (select count(uuid) from file f where f.bno = b.bno);
